title: 1.12.2版本工业2怎么关闭机器过载爆炸
author: p1170775961

replies.author: Lucky_c?
replies.txt_content:
在minecraft./config/IC2.ini里面
找到enableEnetExplosions = ture
改成enableEnetExplosions = false

replies.author: 地球照样转
replies.txt_content:
首先打开游戏界面
